inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: homozygous sickle cell disease, hemoglobin-SC, Sβ-thalassemia, hemoglobin-SO or hemoglobin-SD.

inclusion.criterion: Not on chronic exchange transfusion program
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: not on a chronic exchange transfusion program for at least 2 months

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: written informed consent obtained from patient to participate in the trial

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of severe transfusion reaction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: More than 10 vaso-occlusive episodes in the past 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Religious objection to receiving blood transfusion
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of ischemic stroke within the past 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinical evidence of liver failure or advanced cirrhosis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential with positive pregnancy test at baseline
exclusion.label: unknown
